cache

Class CacheController

  • java.lang.Object
    • cache.CacheController

  • public class CacheController
extends java.lang.Object
    A controller which used to add Comment in to the sharedpreferences and load Comment from the sharedPreferences
    Author:
    xuping

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String cacheKey 
      static java.lang.String favSubKey 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CacheController()
      Construct a CacheController object

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AddCacheReply(Activity activity, java.lang.String parentId, Comment reply)
      Add a new comment in to sharedpreferences,(into a CommentList pointed by a key which is the same as the given comment's parent's id) if the CommentList not exist, a new CommentList will be created and the given Comment will be added, then that CommentList will be stored as a CommentList pointed by a key equals the given comment's parent's id.
      void AddFav(Activity activity, Comment comment)
      Add a new comment in to sharedpreferences as favorite comment,(into a CommentList pointed by key "FAVOURITES") if the CommentList not exist, a new CommentList will be created and the given Comment will be added, then that CommentList will be stored as a CommentList pointed by key "FAVOURITES".
      CommentList loadFav(Activity activity) 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CacheController

        public CacheController()

    • Method Detail

      • loadFav

        public CommentList loadFav(Activity activity)
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity where this function will be called.
        Returns:
        a CommentList Contains all comments which local cached as favorite comment(a CommentList pointed by key "FAVOURITES"), if there's no such CommentList,method returns an empty CommentList.

      • AddFav

        public void AddFav(Activity activity,
          Comment comment)
        Add a new comment in to sharedpreferences as favorite comment,(into a CommentList pointed by key "FAVOURITES") if the CommentList not exist, a new CommentList will be created and the given Comment will be added, then that CommentList will be stored as a CommentList pointed by key "FAVOURITES".
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity where this function will be called.
        comment - a Comment object.

      • AddCacheReply

        public void AddCacheReply(Activity activity,
                 java.lang.String parentId,
                 Comment reply)
        Add a new comment in to sharedpreferences,(into a CommentList pointed by a key which is the same as the given comment's parent's id) if the CommentList not exist, a new CommentList will be created and the given Comment will be added, then that CommentList will be stored as a CommentList pointed by a key equals the given comment's parent's id.
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity where this function will be called.
        parentId - a String which is the parent comment id.
        reply - a Comment object.
